tool_plan.objective: Determine one choice to recommend (ex-post blind) for the proposal 0xa2b9d0717a82a111acc27e514bed07caa9b8636c12dd68fb61ae4dc57503c3cd in aavedao.eth space, including analysis of full votes timeline and on-chain holder distribution and concentration.

calls.why: Fetch the proposal meta including start and end timestamps to analyze the voting timeline accurately.
Analyze the voting timeline with full votes data to understand vote distribution and participation across choices.
Compute total holders and top-100 holder distribution/concentration for on-chain participation metrics.

tool_plan.notes: The start and end timestamps used in analyze_timeline are derived from EVENT_START_UTC and EVENT_

decision.summary: Due to absence of vote data and governance token address, no evidence supports 'YAE' or 'NAY'. Abstaining is the cautious recommendation.
key_arguments_for: No vote data available to support other choices.
Lack of governance token address prevents onchain holder analysis.
decision.simulation_reason: No votes data available to perform vote tally or participation analysis.
